original_text: Jesus told this story to him: ‘One day an important man prepared a big meal. He asked many people to come to eat in his house.
korean_text: 이르시되 어떤 사람이 큰 잔치를 베풀고 많은 사람을 청하였더니

sentences.original_text: Jesus told this story to him:
'One day an important man prepared a big meal.
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 한 중요한 사람이 큰 식사를 준비했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He asked many people to come to eat in his house.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 많은 사람들을 집에서 식사하러 오도록 초대했습니다.
